67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb4.content: Collect feedback using delightful surveys with high response rates. Free plan includes 1 active survey, 25 responses per survey and customizable templates.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb5.title: Keywords AI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb5.content: The best LLM monitoring platform. One format to call 200+ LLMs with 2 lines of code. 10,000 free requests every month and $0 for platform features!

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb6.title: Portkey
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb6.content: Control panel for Gen AI apps featuring an observability suite & an AI gateway. Send & log up to 10,000 requests for free every month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb7.title: Braintrust
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb7.content: Evals, prompt playground, and data management for Gen AI. Free plan gives upto 1,000 private eval rows/week.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb8.title: Findr
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb8.content: Universal search that lets you search all your apps, at once. Search assistant that lets you answer questions using your information. Free plan offers unlimited unified search and 5 co daily co pilot queries.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb9.title: ReportGPT
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebb9.content: AI Powered Writing Assistant. The entire platform is free as long as you bring your own API key.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebba.title: Clair
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebba.content: Clinical AI Reference. Students have free access to the professional tool suite, which includes Open Search, Clinical Summary, Med Review, Drug Interactions, ICD-10 Codes, and Stewardship. Additionally, a free trial for the professional suite is available.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbb.title: Langtrace
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbb.content: enables developers to trace, evaluate, manage prompts and datasets, and debug issues related to an LLM application's performance. It creates open telemetry standard traces for any LLM which helps with observability and works with any observability client. Free plan offers 50K traces/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbc.title: LangWatch
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbc.content: A LLMOps platform helping AI teams measure, monitor, and optimize LLM applications for reliability, cost-efficiency, and performance. With a powerful DSPy component, we enable seamless collaboration between engineers and non-technical teams to fine-tune and productionize GenAI products. Free plan includes all platform features, 1k traces/month and 1 workflow DSPy optimizers. [#opensource](https://github.com/langwatch/langwatch)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbd.title: Ultra AI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbd.content: AI command center for your product. Features include multi-provider AI gateway, prompts manager, caching, logs, analytics, model fallbacks and user rate limiting. Free forever plan offers 10k+ requests per month and all the features except caching.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbe.title: Comet Opik
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbe.content: Evaluate, test, and ship LLM applications across your dev and production lifecycles. [#opensource](https://github.com/comet-ml/opik/)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbf.title: Langfuse
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebbf.content: Open-source LLM engineering platform that helps teams collaboratively debug, analyze, and iterate on their LLM applications. Free forever plan includes 50k observations per month and all platform features. [#opensource](https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc0.title: Pollinations.AI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc0.content: easy-to-use, free image generation AI with free API available. No signups or API keys required, and several option for integrating into a website or workflow. [#opensource](https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc1.title: Othor AI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc1.content: An AI-native fast, simple, and secure alternative to popular business intelligence solutions like Tableau, Power BI, and Looker. Othor utilizes large language models (LLMs) to deliver custom business intelligence solutions in minutes. The Free Forever plan provides one workspace with five datasource connections for one user, with no limits on analytics. [#opensource](https://github.com/othorai/othor.ai)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc2.title: OpenRouter
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc2.content: Provides various free AI models including DeepSeek R1, V3, Llama, and Moonshot AI. These models excel in natural language processing and are suitable for diverse development needs. Note that while these models are free to use, they are subject to rate limits. Additionally, OpenRouter offers paid models for more advanced requirements, for instance Claude, OpenAI, Grok, Gemini, and Nova.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc3.title: bootstrapcdn.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc3.content: CDN for bootstrap, bootswatch and fontawesome.io

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc4.title: cdnjs.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc4.content: Simple. Fast. Reliable. Content delivery at its finest. cdnjs is a free and open-source CDN service trusted by over 11% of all websites, powered by Cloudflare.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc5.title: developers.google.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc5.content: The Google Hosted Libraries is a content distribution network for the most popular Open Source JavaScript libraries

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc6.title: Stellate
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc6.content: Stellate is a blazing-fast, reliable CDN for your GraphQL API and free for two services.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc7.title: jsdelivr.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc7.content: A free, fast, and reliable open-source CDN. Supports npm, GitHub, WordPress, Deno, and more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc8.title: Microsoft Ajax
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc8.content: The Microsoft Ajax CDN hosts popular third-party JavaScript libraries such as jQuery and enables you to easily add them to your Web application

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc9.title: ovh.ie
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebc9.content: Free DDoS protection and SSL certificate

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebca.title: Skypack
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebca.content: The 100% Native ES Module JavaScript CDN. Free for 1 million requests per domain per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcb.title: raw.githack.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcb.content: A modern replacement of **rawgit.com** which simply hosts file using Cloudflare

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcc.title: section.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcc.content: A simple way to spin up and manage a complete Varnish Cache solution. Supposedly free forever for one site

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcd.title: statically.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebcd.content: CDN for Git repos (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), WordPress-related assets, and images

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebce.title: toranproxy.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebce.content: Proxy for Packagist and GitHub. Never fail CD. Free for personal use, one developer, no support

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd0.title: weserv
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd0.content: An image cache & resize service. Manipulate images on the fly with a worldwide cache.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd3.title: CacheFly
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd3.content: Up to 5 TB per month of Free CDN traffic, 19 Core PoPs , 1 Domain and Universal SSL.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd4.title: anvil.works
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd4.content: Web app development with nothing but Python. Free tier with unlimited apps and 30-second timeouts.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd5.title: appwrite
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd5.content: Unlimited projects with no project pausing (supports websockets) and authentication service. 1 Database, 3 Buckets, 5 Functions per project in free tier.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd6.title: configure.it
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd6.content: Mobile app development platform, free for two projects, limited features but no resource limits

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd7.title: codenameone.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd7.content: Open source, cross-platform, mobile app development toolchain for Java/Kotlin developers. Free for commercial use with an unlimited number of projects

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd8.title: deco.cx
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd8.content: Edge-native frontend platform with a visual CMS auto-generated from TypeScript code. Built-in A/B testing, content segmentation, and real-time analytics. Perfect for content-heavy and Enterprise e-commerce websites. Free up to 5k pageviews/month or open-source/personal projects.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd9.title: Deno Deploy
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebd9.content: Distributed system that runs JavaScript, TypeScript, and WebAssembly at the edge worldwide. The free tier includes 100,000 requests per day and 100 GiB data transfers per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdb.title: encore.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdb.content: Backend framework using static analysis to provide automatic infrastructure, boilerplate-free code, and more. Includes free cloud hosting for hobby projects.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdc.title: flightcontrol.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdc.content: Deploy web services, databases, and more on your own AWS account with a Git push style workflow. Free tier for users with 1 developer on personal GitHub repos. AWS costs are billed through AWS, but you can use credits and the AWS free tier.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdd.title: gigalixir.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdd.content: Gigalixir provides one free instance that never sleeps and a free-tier PostgreSQL database limited to 2 connections, 10, 000 rows and no backups for Elixir/Phoenix apps.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebde.title: Glitch
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebde.content: Free public hosting with code sharing and real-time collaboration features. The free plan has a 1000-hours/month limit.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdf.title: Lade
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebdf.content: Lade is a cloud platform built for developers. The free tier includes three services, which can be either apps or databases. Each service includes 128 MB RAM and 1 GB storage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe0.title: pipedream.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe0.content: An integration platform built for developers. Develop any workflow based on any trigger. Workflows are code you can run [for free](https://docs.pipedream.com/pricing/). No server or cloud resources to manage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe1.title: pythonanywhere.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe1.content: Cloud Python app hosting. Beginner account is free, 1 Python web application at your-username.pythonanywhere.com domain, 512 MB private file storage, one MySQL database

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe2.title: ampt.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe2.content: Ampt lets teams build, deploy, and scale JavaScript apps on AWS without complicated configs or managing infrastructure. Free Preview plan includes 500 invocations hourly, 2,500 invocations daily and 50,000 invocations monthly. Custom domains are allowed only in the paid plans.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe3.title: Koyeb
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe3.content: Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 512MB memory, 2GB storage, and 0.1 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe4.title: Napkin
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe4.content: FaaS with 500Mb of memory, a default timeout of 15 seconds, and 5,000 free API calls/month rate-limited to 5 calls/second.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe5.title: Meteor Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe5.content: Galaxy hosting. Meteor's platform-as-a-service for Meteor apps includes free MongoDB Shared Hosting and automatic SSL.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe6.title: Northflank
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe6.content: Build and deploy microservices, jobs, and managed databases with a powerful UI, API & CLI. Seamlessly scale containers from version control and external Docker registries. The free tier includes two services, two cron jobs and 1 database.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe7.title: YepCode
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe7.content: All-in-one platform to connect APIs and services in a serverless environment. It brings all the agility and benefits of NoCode tools but with all the power of using programming languages. The free tier includes [1.000 yeps](https://yepcode.io/pricing/).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe8.title: WunderGraph
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe8.content: An open-source platform that allows you to  quickly build, ship and manage modern APIs. Built-in CI/CD, GitHub integration, and automatic HTTPS. Up to 3 projects, 1GB egress, 300 minutes of build time per month on the [free plan](https://wundergraph.com/pricing)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe9.title: Zeabur
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebe9.content: Deploy your services with one click. Free for three services, with US$ 5 free credits per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebea.title: mogenius
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebea.content: Easily build, deploy, and run services on Kubernetes. The free tier supports connecting a local Kubernetes with mogenius, enabling individual developers to create a production-like test environment on their machine.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebeb.title: genezio
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebeb.content: A serverless function provider offers 1 million function calls, 100GB of bandwidth, and 10 cron jobs per month for free, exclusively for non-commercial or academic use.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebec.title: Activepieces
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebec.content: Build automation flows to connect several apps together in your app's backend. For example, send a Slack message or add a Google Sheet row when an event fires in your app. Free up to 5,000 tasks per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebed.title: back4app.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebed.content: Back4App is an easy-to-use, flexible and scalable backend based on Parse Platform.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebee.title: backendless.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebee.content: Mobile and Web Baas, with 1 GB file storage free, push notifications of 50,000/month, and 1000 data objects in the table.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebef.title: bismuth.cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebef.content: Our AI will boostrap your Python API on our function runtime and hosted storage, build and host for free in our online editor or locally with your favorite tools.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf0.title: BMC Developer Program
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf0.content: The BMC Developer Program provides documentation and resources to build and deploy digital innovations for your enterprise. Access to a comprehensive, personal sandbox that includes the platform, SDK, and a library of components that can be used to build and tailor apps.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf1.title: connectycube.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf1.content: Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 1000 users.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf2.title: convex.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf2.content: Reactive backend as a service, hosting your data (documents with relationships & serializable ACID transactions), serverless functions, and WebSockets to stream updates to various clients. Free for small projects - up to 1M records, 5M monthly function calls.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf3.title: darklang.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf3.content: Hosted language combined with editor and infrastructure. Accessible during the beta, a generous free tier is planned after beta.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf4.title: Firebase
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf4.content: Firebase helps you build and run successful apps. Free Spark Plan offers Authentication, Hosting, Firebase ML, Realtime Database, Cloud Storage, Testlab. A/B Testing, Analytics, App Distribution, App Indexing, Cloud Messaging (FCM), Crashlytics, Dynamic Links, In-App Messaging, Performance Monitoring, Predictions, and Remote Config are always free.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf5.title: Flutter Flow
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf5.content: Build your Flutter App UI without writing a single line of code. Also has a Firebase integration. The free plan includes full access to UI Builder and Free templates.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf6.title: getstream.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf6.content: Build scalable In-App Chat, Messaging, Video and audio, and Feeds in a few hours instead of weeks

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf7.title: hasura.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf7.content: Hasura extends your existing databases wherever it is hosted and provides an instant GraphQL API that can be securely accessed for web, mobile, and data integration workloads. Free for 1GB/month of data pass-through.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf8.title: iron.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf8.content: Async task processing (like AWS Lambda) with free tier and 1-month free trial

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf9.title: nhost.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebf9.content: Serverless backend for web and mobile apps. The free plan includes PostgreSQL, GraphQL (Hasura), Authentication, Storage, and Serverless Functions.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfa.title: onesignal.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfa.content: Unlimited free push notifications. 10,000 email sends per month, with unlimited contacts and access to Auto Warm Up.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfb.title: paraio.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfb.content: Backend service API with flexible authentication, full-text search and caching. Free for one app, 1GB of app data.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfc.title: progress.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfc.content: Mobile backend, starter plan has unlimited requests/second, with 1 GB of data storage. Enterprise application support

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfd.title: pubnub.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfd.content: Free push notifications for up to 1 million messages/month and 100 active daily devices

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfe.title: pushbots.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebfe.content: Push notification service. Free for up to 1.5 million pushes/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebff.title: pushcrew.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbebff.content: Push notification service. Unlimited notifications for up to 2,000 Subscribers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec00.title: pusher.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec00.content: Free, unlimited push notifications for 2000 monthly active users. A single API for iOS and Android devices.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec01.title: quickblox.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec01.content: A communication backend for instant messaging, video, and voice calling, and push notifications

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec02.title: restspace.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec02.content: Configure a server with services for auth, data, files, email API, templates, and more, then compose into pipelines and transform data.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec03.title: Salesforce Developer Program
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec03.content: Build apps Lightning fast with drag-and-drop tools. Customize your data model with clicks. Go further with Apex code. Integrate with anything using powerful APIs. Stay protected with enterprise-grade security. Customize UI with clicks or any leading-edge web framework. Free Developer Program gives access to the full Lightning Platform.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec04.title: ServiceNow Developer Program
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec04.content: Rapidly build, test, and deploy applications that make work better for your organization. Free Instance & access to early previews.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec05.title: simperium.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec05.content: Move data everywhere instantly and automatically, multi-platform, unlimited sending and storage of structured data, max. 2,500 users/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec06.title: Singlebase.cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec06.content: SinglebaseCloud is an AI-powered all-in-one backend platform to accelerate app development. It offers tools like Vector DB, Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, and Storage, aiming to simplify backend development. Free/Starter Plan offers Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, Storage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec07.title: stackstorm.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec07.content: Event-driven automation for apps, services, and workflows, free without flow, access control, LDAP

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec08.title: streamdata.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec08.content: Turns any REST API into an event-driven streaming API. Free plan up to 1 million messages and ten concurrent connections.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec09.title: Supabase
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec09.content: The Open Source Firebase Alternative to build backends. Free Plan offers Authentication, Realtime Database & Object Storage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0a.title: tyk.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0a.content: API management with authentication, quotas, monitoring and analytics. Free cloud offering

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0b.title: zapier.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0b.content: Connect the apps you use to automate tasks. Five zaps every 15 minutes and 100 tasks/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0c.title: IFTTT
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0c.content: Automate your favorite apps and devices. Free 2 Applets

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0d.title: Integrately
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0d.content: Automate tedious tasks with a single click. Free 100 Tasks, 15 Minute

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0e.title: LeanCloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0e.content: Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, and 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0f.title: Clappia
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec0f.content: A low-code platform designed for building business process applications with customizable mobile and web apps. Offers a drag-and-drop interface, features like Offline Support, real-time location tracking and integration with various third-party services.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec10.title: Basedash
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec10.content: Low-code platform for building internal admin panels and dashboards. Supports SQL databases and REST APIs.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec11.title: BudiBase
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec11.content: Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec12.title: appsmith
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec12.content: Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec13.title: ToolJet
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec13.content: Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc., and build apps using drag-and-drop application builder.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec14.title: ReTool
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec14.content: Low-code platform for building internal applications. Retool is highly hackable. If you can write it with JavaScript and an API, you can make it in Retool. The free tier allows up to five users per month, unlimited apps and API connections.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec15.title: DronaHQ
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec15.content: DronaHQ - a low code platform that helps engineering teams and product managers to build internal tools, custom user journeys, digital experiences, automation, custom admin panels, operational apps 10X faster.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec16.title: ILLA Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec16.content: ILLA Cloud - A robust open-source low-code platform for developers to build internal tools. By using ILLA's library of Components and Actions, developers can save massive amounts of time on building tools. Free for 5 team members.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec17.title: outsystems.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec17.content: Enterprise web development PaaS for on-premise or cloud, free "personal environment" offering allows for unlimited code and up to 1 GB database

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec18.title: UI Bakery
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec18.content: Low-code platform that enables faster building of custom web applications. Supports building UI using drag and drop with a high level of customization through JavaScript, Python, and SQL. Available as both cloud and self-hosted solutions. Free for up to 5 users.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec19.title: Mendix
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec19.content: Rapid Application Development for Enterprises, unlimited accessible sandbox environments supporting total users, 0.5 GB storage and 1 GB RAM per app. Also, Studio and Studio Pro IDEs are allowed in the free tier.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1a.title: lil'bots
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1a.content: write and run scripts online utlizing free built-in APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic, Firecrawl and others. Great for building AI agents / internal tooling and sharing with team. Free-tier includes full access to APIs, AI coding assistant and 10,000 execution credits / month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1b.title: Alwaysdata
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1b.content: 100 MB free web hosting with support for MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, MongoDB, PHP, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Java, Deno, custom web servers, access via FTP, WebDAV and SSH; mailbox, mailing list and app installer included.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1c.title: Awardspace.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1c.content: Free web hosting + a free short domain, PHP, MySQL, App Installer, Email Sending & No Ads.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1d.title: Bohr
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1d.content: Free for non commercial projects + Developer-First Deployment and Development Platform that minimizes infrastructure hassle and speed up setup.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1e.title: Bubble
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1e.content: Visual programming to build web and mobile apps without code, free with Bubble branding.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1f.title: dAppling Network
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec1f.content: Decentralized web hosting platform for Web3 frontends focusing on increasing uptime and security and providing an additional access point for users.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec20.title: DigitalOcean
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec20.content: Build and deploy three static sites for free on the App Platform Starter tier.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec21.title: Drive To Web
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec21.content: Host directly to the web from Google Drive & OneDrive. Static sites only. Free forever. One site per Google/Microsoft account.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec22.title: Fenix Web Server
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec22.content: A developer desktop app for hosting sites locally and sharing them publically (in real-time). Work however you like, using its beautiful user interface, API, and/or CLI.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec23.title: Fern
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec23.content: Build and host a Markdown-based documentation site on Fern's free plan. You can even auto-generate an API reference for your site from API definition files. The site is hosted at _yoursite_.docs.buildwithfern.com.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec24.title: Free Hosting
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec24.content: Free Hosting With PHP 5, Perl, CGI, MySQL, FTP, File Manager, POP E-Mail, free sub-domains, free domain hosting, DNS Zone Editor, Web Site Statistics, FREE Online Support and many more features not offered by other free hosts.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec25.title: Freehostia
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec25.content: FreeHostia offers free hosting services incl. an industry-best Control Panel & a 1-click installation of 50+ free apps. Instant setup. No forced ads.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec26.title: HelioHost
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec26.content: Non-profit free web hosting with Plesk control panel, PHP, Node.js, Python, Django, Flask, .NET, Perl, CGI, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, IMAP/POP3/SMTP email, unlimited bandwidth, free subdomains, 1000 MB storage for free with the option to upgrade.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec27.title: Kinsta Static Site Hosting
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec27.content: Deploy up to 100 static sites for free, custom domains with SSL, 100 GB monthly bandwidth, 260+ Cloudflare CDN locations.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec28.title: Lecturify
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec28.content: Web hosting with SFPT access for file upload and download, php available.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec29.title: Neocities
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec29.content: Static, 1 GB free storage with 200 GB Bandwidth.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2a.title: Netlify
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2a.content: Builds, deploys and hosts static site/app free for 100 GB data and 100 GB/month bandwidth.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2b.title: pantheon.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2b.content: Drupal and WordPress hosting, automated DevOps, and scalable infrastructure. Free for developers and agencies. No custom domain.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2c.title: readthedocs.org
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2c.content: Free documentation hosting with versioning, PDF generation, and more

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2d.title: render.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2d.content: Unified cloud to build and run apps and sites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks, auto-deploys from Git, and completely free plans for web services, databases, and static web pages.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2e.title: SourceForge
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2e.content: Find, Create, and Publish Open Source software for free

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2f.title: surge.sh
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec2f.content: Static web publishing for Front-End developers. Unlimited sites with custom domain support

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec31.title: tilda.cc
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec31.content: One site, 50 pages, 50 MB storage, only the main pre-defined blocks among 170+ available, no fonts, no favicon, and no custom domain

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec32.title: Vercel
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec32.content: Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec33.title: Versoly
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec33.content: SaaS-focused website builder - unlimited websites, 70+ blocks, five templates, custom CSS, favicon, SEO and forms. No custom domain.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec34.title: Qoddi
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec34.content: PaaS service similar to Heroku with a developer-centric approach and all-inclusive features. Free tier for static assets, staging, and developer apps.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec35.title: FreeFlarum
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec35.content: Community-powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove the watermark from the footer).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec36.title: fleek.co
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec36.content: Build modern sites and apps on the Open Web and its protocols seamlessly free for unlimited websites and 50 GB/month bandwidth.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec37.title: MDB GO
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec37.content: Free hosting for one project with two weeks Container TTL, 500 MB RAM per project, SFTP - 1G disk space.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec38.title: Patr Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec38.content: An easy-to-use cloud platform, among its paid services it offers to host three static sites for free.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec39.title: Serv00.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec39.content: 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3a.content: Free public DNS Resolver, which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by Cloudflare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). It can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3b.title: 1984.is
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3b.content: Free DNS service with API and lots of other free DNS features included.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3c.title: cloudns.net
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3c.content: Free DNS hosting up to 1 domain with 50 records

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3d.title: deSEC
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3d.content: Free DNS hosting with API support, designed with security in mind. Runs on open-source software and is supported by [SSE](https://www.securesystems.de/).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3e.title: dns.he.net
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3e.content: Free DNS hosting service with Dynamic DNS Support

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3f.title: Zonomi
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec3f.content: Free DNS hosting service with instant DNS propagation. Free plan: 1 DNS zone (domain name) with up to 10 DNS records.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec41.title: duckdns.org
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec41.content: Free DDNS with up to 5 domains on the free tier. With configuration guides for various setups.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec42.title: Dynv6.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec42.content: Free DDNS service with [API support](https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec43.title: freedns.afraid.org
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec43.content: Free DNS hosting. Also, provide free subdomains based on numerous public user [contributed domains](https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/). Get free subdomains from the "Subdomains" menu after signing up.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec44.title: luadns.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec44.content: Free DNS hosting, three domains, all features with reasonable limits

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec45.title: namecheap.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec45.content: Free DNS. No limit on the number of domains

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec47.title: noip.at
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec47.content: Free DDNS service without registration, tracking, logging or advertising. No limit to domains.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec48.title: noip
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec48.content: a dynamic DNS service that allows up to 3 hostnames free with confirmation every 30 days

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec49.title: sslip.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec49.content: Free DNS service that when queried with a hostname with an embedded IP address returns that IP address.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec4b.title: zoneedit.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec4b.content: Free DNS hosting with Dynamic DNS Support.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec4c.title: zonewatcher.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec4c.content: Automatic backups and DNS change monitoring. One domain free

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec50.title: eu.org
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec50.content: Free eu.org domain. The request is usually approved in 14 days.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec53.title: 4EVERLAND
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec53.content: Compatible with AWS S3 - APIs, interface operations, CLI, and other upload methods, upload and store files from the IPFS and Arweave networks in a safe, convenient, and efficient manner. Registered users can get 6 GB of IPFS storage and 300MB of Arweave storage for free. Any Arweave file uploads smaller than 150 KB are free.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec54.title: backblaze.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec54.content: Backblaze B2 cloud storage. Free 10 GB (Amazon S3-like) object storage for unlimited time

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec55.title: filebase.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec55.content: S3 Compatible Object Storage Powered by Blockchain. 5 GB free storage for an unlimited duration.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec56.title: Tebi
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec56.content: S3 compatibility object storage.Free 25 GB storage and 250GB outbound transfer.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec57.title: Idrive e2
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec57.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 10 GB free storage and 10 GB download bandwidth per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec58.title: C2 Object Storage
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec58.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 15 GB free storage and 15 GB downloads per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec59.title: Aiven
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec59.content: Aiven offers free PostgreSQL, MySQL and Redis plans on its open-source data platform. Single node, 1 CPU, 1GB RAM, and for PostgreSQL and MySQL, 5GB storage. Easy migration to more extensive plans or across clouds.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5a.title: airtable.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5a.content: Looks like a spreadsheet, but it's a relational database unlimited bases, 1,200 rows/base, and 1,000 API requests/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5b.title: Astra
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5b.content: Cloud Native Cassandra as a Service with [80GB free tier](https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-astra/pricing)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5c.title: codehooks.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5c.content: Easy to use JavaScript serverless API/backend and NoSQL database service with functions, Mongdb-ish queries, key/value lookups, a job system, realtime messages, worker queues, a powerful CLI and a web-based data manager. Free plan has 5GB storage and 60/API calls per minute. 2 developers included. No credit-card required.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5d.title: CrateDB
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5d.content: Distributed Open Source SQL database for real-time analytics. [Free Tier CRFREE](https://crate.io/lp-crfree): One-node with 2 CPUs, 2 GiB of memory, 8 GiB of storage. One cluster per organization, no payment method needed.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5e.title: FaunaDB
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5e.content: Serverless cloud database with native GraphQL, multi-model access, and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5f.title: Upstash
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec5f.content: Serverless Redis with free tier up to 10,000 requests per day, 256MB max database size, and 20 concurrent connections

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec61.title: redsmin.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec61.content: Online real-time monitoring and administration service for Redis, Monitoring for 1 Redis instance free

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec63.title: MemCachier
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec63.content: Managed Memcache service. Free for up to 25MB, 1 Proxy Server, and basic analytics

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec64.title: scalingo.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec64.content: Primarily a PaaS but offers a 128MB to 192MB free tier of MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec65.title: SeaTable
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec65.content: Flexible, Spreadsheet-like Database built by the Seafile team. unlimited tables, 2,000 lines, 1-month versioning, up to 25 team members.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec66.title: skyvia.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec66.content: Cloud Data Platform offers a free tier and all plans are completely free while in beta

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec67.title: StackBy
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec67.content: One tool that combines spreadsheets' flexibility, databases' power, and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. The free plan includes unlimited users, ten stacks, and a 2GB attachment per stack.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec68.title: TiDB Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec68.content: TiDB is an open-source MySQL-compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Serverless provides 5GB of row storage, 5GB of column storage, and 50 million Request Units (RUs) for free each month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec69.title: Turso by ChiselStrike
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec69.content: Turso is SQLite Developer Experience in an Edge Database. Turso provides a Free Forever starter plan, 9 GB of total storage, Up to 500 databases, Up to 3 locations, 1 billion row reads per month, and Local development support with SQLite.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6a.title: InfluxDB
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6a.content: Timeseries database, free up to 3MB/5 minutes writes, 30MB/5 minutes reads and 10,000 cardinalities series

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6b.title: restdb.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6b.content: a fast and straightforward NoSQL cloud database service. With restdb.io you get schema, relations, automatic REST API (with MongoDB-like queries), and an efficient multi-user admin UI for working with data. The free plan allows 3 users, 2500 records, and 1 API request per second.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6d.title: Neo4j Aura
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6d.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6e.title: Neon
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6e.content: Managed PostgreSQL, 0.5 GB of storage (total), 1 Project ,10 branches, Unlimited Databases, always-available primary branch ( Auto suspend after 5 minutes), 20 hours of Active time per month (total) for non-primary branch compute.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6f.title: Dgraph Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec6f.content: Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data transfer per day.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec70.title: Tinybird
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec70.content: A serverless managed ClickHouse with connection-less data ingest over HTTP and lets you publish SQL queries as managed HTTP APIs. There is no time limit on free-tier, 10GB storage + 1000 API requests per day.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec71.title: TigerGraph Cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec71.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. One free instance with two vCPU, 8GB Memory, and 50GB storage that sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec72.title: TerminusCMS
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec72.content: Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec73.title: filess.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec73.content: filess.io is a platform where you can create two databases with up to 10 MB per database of the following DBMS for free: MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec74.title: xata.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec74.content: Xata is a serverless database with built-in powerful search and analytics. One API, multiple type-safe client libraries, and optimized for your development workflow. The free-forever tier is sufficient for hobby developers which comes with three units of Xata, please refer to the website for unit definition.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec75.title: 8base.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec75.content: 8base is a full-stack low-code development platform built for JavaScript developers built on top of MySQL and GraphQL and serverless backend-as-a-service. It allows you to start building web applications quickly using a UI app builder and scale quickly, The Free tier includes rows: 2,500, Storage: 500, Serverless computing: 1Gb/h, and client app users: 5.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec76.title: Nile
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec76.content: A Postgres platform for B2B apps. Unlimited databases, Always available with no shutdown, 1GB of storage (total), 50 million query tokens, autoscaling, unlimited vector embeddings

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec77.title: Pinggy
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec77.content: Public URLs for localhost with a single command, no downloads required. HTTPS / TCP / TLS tunnels. The free plan has 60 minutes tunnel lifetime.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec77.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec78.title: conveyor.cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec78.content: Visual Studio extension to expose IIS Express to the local network or over a tunnel to a public URL.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec78.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec79.title: Hamachi
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec79.content: LogMeIn Hamachi is a hosted VPN service that lets you securely extend LAN-like networks to distributed teams with a free plan that allows unlimited networks with up to 5 people
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec79.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7a.title: Mirna Sockets
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7a.content: Free Socket as a Service Platform that gives you a wss:// URL when deploying your Web Socket Server code and also allows you to monitor its performance.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7a.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7b.title: localhost.run
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7b.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7b.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7c.title: localtunnel
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7c.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7c.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7d.title: ngrok.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7d.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7d.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7e.title: cname.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7e.content: Free and secure dynamic reverse proxy service.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7e.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7f.title: serveo
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7f.content: Expose local servers to the internet. No installation, no signup. Free subdomain, no limits.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec7f.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec80.title: Radmin VPN
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec80.content: Connect multiple computers together via a VPN-enabling LAN-like network. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative)
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec80.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec81.title: segment.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec81.content: Hub to translate and route events to other third-party services. 100,000 events/month free
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec81.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec82.title: Google STUN — [stun:stun.l.google.com:19302](stun:stun.l.google.com:19302)
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec82.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec83.title: Twilio STUN — [stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp](stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp)
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec83.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec84.title: Tailscale
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec84.content: Zero config VPN, using the open-source WireGuard protocol. Installs on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android devices. Free plan for personal use with 100 devices and three users.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec84.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec85.title: webhookrelay.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec85.content: Manage, debug, fan-out, and proxy all your webhooks to public or internal (i.e. localhost) destinations. Also, expose servers running in a private network over a tunnel by getting a public HTTP endpoint (`https://yoursubdomain.webrelay.io <----> http://localhost:8080`).
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec85.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec86.title: Hookdeck
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec86.content: Develop, test, and monitor your webhooks from anywhere. 100K requests and 100K attempts per month with three days retention.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec86.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec87.title: Xirsys
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec87.content: Unlimited STUN usage + 500 MB monthly TURN bandwidth, capped bandwidth, single geographic region.
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec87.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec88.title: ZeroTier
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbec88.content: FOSS managed virtual Ethernet as a service. Unlimited end-to-end encrypted networks of 25 clients on the free plan. Clients for desktop/mobile/NA; web interface for configuration of custom routing rules and approval of new client nodes on private networks

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecac.title: Linear

Free for up to 10 users, 20 custom fields, 2GB of storage space, Video Recording with AI limited to 5 mins/video, Automation Runs at 20/user/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecae.title: Lucidchart

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecb2.title: Ora

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecb8.title: ScrumFast

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecba.title: Shortcut

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecc7.title: trello.com

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecc8.title: Tweek

[Toggl Track](https://toggl.com/track/) for time management and tracking app with a free plan provides seamless time tracking and reporting designed with freelancers in mind. And [Toggl Plan](https://toggl.com/plan/) for task planning with a free plan for solo developers with unlimited tasks, milestones, and timelines.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd2.title: Pulse.red
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd2.content: Free Minimalistic Time Tracker and Timesheet app for projects.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd4.title: borgbase.com

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd5.title: icedrive.net
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd5.content: Simple cloud storage service. 10 GB free storage

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd6.title: sync.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd6.content: End-to-End cloud storage service. 5 GB of free storage

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd7.title: pcloud.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecd7.content: Cloud storage service. Up to 10 GB of free storage

Open source plugins for responsive images, 360 image making and image editing. Free monthly plan with 25GB of CDN traffic 25GB of cache storage and unlimited transformations.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecda.title: cloudinary.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecda.content: Image upload, powerful manipulations, storage, and delivery for sites and apps, with Ruby, Python, Java, PHP, Objective-C, and more libraries. The free tier includes 25 monthly credits. One credit equals 1,000 image transformations, 1 GB of storage, or 1 GB of CDN usage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecdb.title: embed.ly
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecdb.content: Provides APIs for embedding media in a webpage, responsive image scaling, and extracting elements from a webpage. Free for up to 5,000 URLs/month at 15 requests/second

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecdc.title: filestack.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecdc.content: File picker, transform, and deliver, free for 250 files, 500 transformations, and 3 GB bandwidth

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecde.title: freetools.site
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecde.content: Free online tools. Convert or edit documents, images, audio, video, and more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecdf.title: GoFile.io

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece0.title: gumlet.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece0.content: Image and video hosting, processing and streaming via CDN. Provides generous free tier of 250 GB / month for videos and 30 GB  / month for images.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece1.title: image-charts.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece1.content: Unlimited image chart generation with a watermark

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece2.title: Imgbot

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece3.title: ImgBB

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece4.title: imgen
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece4.content: Free unlimited social cover image generation API, no watermark

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece5.title: imgix
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece5.content: Image Caching, management and CDN. Free plan includes 1000 origin images, infinite transformations and 100 GB bandwidth

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece6.title: kraken.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece6.content: Image optimization for website performance as a service, free plan up to 1 MB file size

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece7.title: kvstore.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece7.content: Key-value storage service. The free tier allows 100 keys, 1KB/key, 100 calls/hour

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece8.title: npoint.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece8.content: JSON store with collaborative schema editing

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece9.title: nitropack.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbece9.content: Accelerate your site's speed on autopilot with complete front-end optimization (caching, images and code optimization, CDN). Free for up to 5,000 pageviews/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecea.title: otixo.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecea.content: Encrypt, share, copy, and move all your cloud storage files from one place. The basic plan provides unlimited file transfer with 250 MB max. file size and allows five encrypted files

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeceb.title: packagecloud.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeceb.content: Hosted Package Repositories for YUM, APT, RubyGem and PyPI.  Limited free plans and open-source plans are available via request

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecec.title: getpantry.cloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecec.content: A simple JSON data storage API perfect for personal projects, hackathons, and mobile apps!

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecee.title: placekitten.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecee.content: A quick and simple service for getting pictures of kittens for use as placeholders

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecef.title: plot.ly
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecef.content: Graph and share your data. The free tier includes unlimited public files and ten private files

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf0.title: podio.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf0.content: You can use Podio with a team of up to five people and try out the features of the Basic Plan, except user management

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf1.title: QuickChart
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf1.content: Generate embeddable image charts, graphs, and QR codes

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf2.title: redbooth.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf2.content: P2P file syncing, free for up to 2 users

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf4.title: Shotstack
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf4.content: API to generate and edit video at scale. Free up to 20 minutes of rendered video per month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf5.title: tinypng.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbecf5.content: API to compress and resize PNG and JPEG images, offers 500 compressions for free each month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed89.title: Apache Netbeans
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed89.content: Development Environment, Tooling Platform and Application Framework.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8a.title: apiary.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8a.content: Collaborative design API with instant API mock and generated documentation (Free for unlimited API blueprints and unlimited users with one admin account and hosted documentation).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8b.title: BBEdit
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8b.content: BBEdit is a popular and extensible editor for macOS. Free Mode provides a [powerful core feature set](https://www.barebones.com/products/bbedit/comparison.html) and an upgrade path to advanced features.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8c.title: Binder
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8c.content: Turn a Git repo into a collection of interactive notebooks. It is a free public service.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8d.title: BlueJ
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8d.content: A free Java Development Environment designed for beginners, used by millions worldwide. Powered by Oracle & simple GUI to help beginners.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8e.title: Bootify.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8e.content: Spring Boot app generator with custom database and REST API.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8f.title: Brackets
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed8f.content: Brackets is an open-source text editor specifically designed for web development. It is lightweight, easy to use, and highly customizable.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed90.title: cacher.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed90.content: Code snippet organizer with labels and support for 100+ programming languages.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed91.title: Code::Blocks
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed91.content: Free Fortran & C/C++ IDE. Open Source and runs on Windows,macOS & Linux.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed92.title: Cody
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed92.content: Free AI coding assistant that can write (Code blocks, autocomplete, unit tests), understand (knowledge of your entire codebase), fix, and find your code. Available for VS Code, JetBrains and Online.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed93.title: codiga.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed93.content: Coding Assistant that lets you search, define, and reuse code snippets directly in your IDE. Free for individual and small organizations.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed94.title: codesnip.com.br
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed94.content: Simple code snippets manager with categories, search and tags. free and unlimited.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed95.title: cocalc.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed95.content: (formerly SageMathCloud at cloud.sagemath.com) — Collaborative calculation in the cloud. Browser access to full Ubuntu with built-in collaboration and lots of free software for mathematics, science, data science, preinstalled: Python, LaTeX, Jupyter Notebooks, SageMath, scikitlearn, etc.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed96.title: code.cs50.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed96.content: Visual Studio Code for CS50 is a web app at code.cs50.io that adapts GitHub Codespaces for students and teachers.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed97.title: codepen.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed97.content: CodePen is a playground for the front-end side of the web.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed98.title: codesandbox.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed98.content: Online Playground for React, Vue, Angular, Preact, and more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed99.title: Components.studio
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed99.content: Code components in isolation, visualize them in stories, test them, and publish them on npm.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9a.title: Eclipse Che
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9a.content: Web-based and Kubernetes-Native IDE for Developer Teams with multi-language support. Open Source and community-driven. An online instance hosted by Red Hat is available at [workspaces.openshift.com](https://workspaces.openshift.com/).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9b.title: fakejson.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9b.content: FakeJSON helps you quickly generate fake data using its API. Make an API request describing what you want and how you want it. The API returns it all in JSON. Speed up the go-to-market process for ideas and fake it till you make it.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9c.title: GetVM
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9c.content: Instant free Linux and IDEs chrome sidebar. The free tier includes 5 VMs per day.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9d.title: GitPod
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9d.content: Instant, ready-to-code dev environments for GitHub projects. The free tier includes 50 hours/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9f.title: JDoodle
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbed9f.content: Online compiler and editor for more than 60 programming languages with a free plan for REST API code compiling up to 200 credits per day.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda0.title: jetbrains.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda0.content: Productivity tools, IDEs and deploy tools (aka [IntelliJ IDEA](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/), [PyCharm](https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/), etc). Free license for students, teachers, Open Source and user groups.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda1.title: jsbin.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda1.content: JS Bin is another playground and code-sharing site of front-end web (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It Also supports Markdown, Jade, and Sass).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda2.title: jsfiddle.net
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda2.content: JS Fiddle is a playground and code-sharing site of front-end web, supporting collaboration.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda4.title: Lazarus
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda4.content: Lazarus is a Delphi-compatible cross-platform IDE for Rapid Application Development.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda6.title: micro-jaymock
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda6.content: Tiny API mocking microservice for generating fake JSON data.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda7.title: mockable.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda7.content: Mockable is a simple configurable service to mock out RESTful API or SOAP web services. This online service allows you to quickly define REST API or SOAP endpoints and have them return JSON or XML data.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda8.title: mockaroo
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda8.content: Mockaroo lets you generate realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats. You can also create mocks for back-end API.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda9.title: Mocklets
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeda9.content: an HTTP-based mock API simulator that helps simulate APIs for faster parallel development and more comprehensive testing, with a lifetime free tier.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedaa.title: Paiza
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedaa.content: Develop Web apps in Browser without needing to set up anything. Free Plan offers one server with 24 24-hour lifetime and 4 hours of running time per day with 2 CPU cores, 2 GB RAM, and 1 GB storage.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedab.title: Prepros
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedab.content: Prepros can compile Sass, Less, Stylus, Pug/Jade, Haml, Slim, CoffeeScript, and TypeScript out of the box, reloads your browsers and makes it easy to develop & test your websites so you can focus on making them perfect. You can also add your own tools with just a few clicks.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedac.title: Replit
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedac.content: A cloud coding environment for various program languages.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedad.title: SoloLearn
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedad.content: A cloud programming playground well-suited for running code snippets. Supports various programming languages. No registration is required for running code, but it is necessary when saving code on their platform. Also offers free courses for beginners and intermediate-level coders.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedae.title: stackblitz.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedae.content: Online/Cloud Code IDE to create, edit, & deploy full-stack apps. Support any popular NodeJs-based frontend & backend frameworks. Shortlink to create a new project: [https://node.new](https://node.new).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedaf.title: Sublime Text
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedaf.content: Sublime Text is a popular, versatile, and highly customizable text editor used for coding and text editing tasks.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb0.title: Visual Studio Code
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb0.content: Code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. Developed by Microsoft.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb1.title: Visual Studio Community
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb1.content: Fully-featured IDE with thousands of extensions, cross-platform app development (Microsoft extensions available for download for iOS and Android), desktop, web and cloud development, multi-language support (C#, C++, JavaScript, Python, PHP and more).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb2.title: VSCodium
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb2.content: Community-driven, without telemetry/tracking, and freely-licensed binary distribution of Microsoft's editor VSCode

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb3.title: wakatime.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb3.content: Quantified self-metrics about your coding activity using text editor plugins, limited plan for free.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb4.title: Wave Terminal
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb4.content: Wave is an open-source, cross-platform terminal for seamless workflows. Render anything inline. Save sessions and history. Powered by open web standards. MacOS and Linux.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb5.title: WebComponents.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb5.content: In-browser IDE to code web components in isolation with 58 templates available, supporting stories, and tests.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb7.title: WebDB
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb7.content: Free Efficient Database IDE. Featuring Server Discovery, ERD, Data Generator, AI, NoSQL Structure Manager, Database Versioning and many more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb8.title: Zed
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb8.content: Zed is a high-performance, multiplayer code editor from the creators of Atom and Tree-sitter.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb9.title: OneCompiler
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedb9.content: Free online compiler supporting 70+ languages including Java, Python, C++, JavaScript.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedba.title: Dwh.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedba.content: Data Cloud Observability Solution (Snowflake). Free for personal use.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbb.title: Hightouch
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbb.content: Hightouch is a Reverse ETL platform that helps you sync customer data from your data warehouse to your CRM, marketing, and support tools. The free tier offers you one destination to sync data to.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbc.title: Avo
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbc.content: Simplified analytics release workflow. Single-source-of-truth tracking plan, type-safe analytics tracking library, in-app debuggers, and data observability to catch all data issues before you release. Free for two workspace members and 1 hour data observability lookback.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbd.title: Branch
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbd.content: Mobile Analytics Platform. Free Tier offers up to 10K Mobile App Users with deep-linking & other services.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbe.title: Cauldron
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbe.content: Analytics open source solution that allows users to aggregate information from multiple collaboration platforms as different types of data sources (Git, Github, and Gitlab). The free tier includes an unlimited number of reports.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbf.title: Census
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedbf.content: Reverse ETL & Operational Analytics Platform. Sync 10 fields from your data warehouse to 60+ SaaS like Salesforce, Zendesk, or Amplitude.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc0.title: Clicky
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc0.content: Website Analytics Platform. Free Plan for one website with 3000 views analytics.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc1.title: Databox
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc1.content: Business Insights & Analytics by combining other analytics & BI platforms. Free Plan offers 3 users, dashboards & data sources. 11M historical data records.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc3.title: amplitude.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc3.content: 1 million monthly events, up to 2 apps

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc4.title: GoatCounter
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc4.content: GoatCounter is an open-source web analytics platform available as a hosted service (free for non-commercial use) or self-hosted app. It aims to offer easy-to-use and meaningful privacy-friendly web analytics as an alternative to Google Analytics or Matomo. The free tier is for non-commercial use and includes unlimited sites, six months of data retention, and 100k pageviews/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc6.title: MetricsWave
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc6.content: Privacy-friendly Google Analytics alternative for developers. Free plan allows 20k pageviews per month without credit card.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc7.title: Expensify
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc7.content: Expense reporting, free personal reporting approval workflow

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc8.title: getinsights.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc8.content: Privacy-focused, cookie-free analytics, free for up to 3k events/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc9.title: heap.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedc9.content: Automatically captures every user action in iOS or web apps. Free for up to 10K monthly sessions.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedca.title: Hotjar
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedca.content: Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. One hundred snapshots/day (max capacity: 300). Three snapshot heatmaps can be stored for 365 days. Unlimited Team Members. Also in App and standalone surveys, feedback widgets with screenshots. Free tier allows creating 3 surveys & 3 feedback widgets and collecting 20 responses per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcb.title: Keen
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcb.content: Custom Analytics for data collection, analysis and visualization. 1,000 events/month free

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcc.title: Yandex.Datalens
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcc.content: Yandex Cloud data visualization and analysis service. The service is provided free of charge. No restrictions on the number of users and requests.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedce.title: Mixpanel
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedce.content: 100,000 monthly tracked users, unlimited data history and seats, US or EU data residency

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcf.title: Moesif
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedcf.content: API analytics for REST and GraphQL. (Free up to 500,000 API calls/mo)

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd0.title: optimizely.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd0.content: A/B Testing solution, free starter plan, one website, 1 iOS, and 1 Android app

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd1.title: Microsoft PowerBI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd1.content: Business Insights & Analytics by Microsoft. Free Plan offers limited use with 1 Million User licenses.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd2.title: Row Zero
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd2.content: Blazingly fast, connected spreadsheet. Connect directly to data databases, S3, and APIs. Import, analyze, graph, and share millions of rows instantly. Three free (forever) workbooks.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd3.title: sematext.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd3.content: Free for up to 50 K actions/month, 1-day data retention, unlimited dashboards, users, etc.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd4.title: Similar Web
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd4.content: Analytics for Web & Mobile Apps. Free Plan offers five results per metric, one month of mobile app data & 3 months of website data.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd5.title: StatCounter
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd5.content: Website Viewer Analytics. Free plan for analytics of 500 most recent visitors.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd6.title: Statsig
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd6.content: All-in-one platform spanning across analytics, feature flagging, and A/B testing. Free for up to 1m metered events per month. Also provides unlinited in-App Surveys with 250/month responses.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd7.title: Tableau Developer Program
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd7.content: Innovate, create, and make Tableau work perfectly for your organization. The free developer program gives a personal development sandbox license for Tableau Online. The version is the latest pre-release version so Data Devs can test each & every feature of this superb platform.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd8.title: usabilityhub.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd8.content: Test designs and mockups on real people and track visitors. Free for one user, unlimited tests

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd9.title: woopra.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedd9.content: Free user analytics platform for 500K actions, 90-day data retention, 30+ one-click integration.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedda.title: counter.dev
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedda.content: Web analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. Free or pay what you want by donation.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddb.title: PostHog
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddb.content: Full Product Analytics suite free for up to 1m tracked events per month. Also provides unlinited in-App Surveys with 250/month responses.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddc.title: Uptrace
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddc.content: Distributed Tracing Tool that helps developers pinpoint failures and find performance bottlenecks. Has a free plan, offers a complimentary Personal subscription for open-source projects, and has an open-source version.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddd.title: Microsoft Clarity
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddd.content: Clarity is a free, easy-to-use tool that captures how real people use your site.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedde.title: Beampipe.io
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedde.content: Beampipe is simple, privacy-focussed web analytics. free for up to 5 domains & 10k monthly page views.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddf.title: Aptabase
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbeddf.content: Open Source, Privacy-Friendly, and Simple Analytics for Mobile and Desktop Apps. SDKs for Swift, Kotlin, React Native, Flutter, Electron, and many others. Free for up to 20,000 events per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede0.title: Trackingplan
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede0.content: Automatically detect digital analytics, marketing data and pixels issues, maintain up-to-date tracking plans, and foster seamless collaboration. Deploy it to your production environment with real traffic or add analytics coverage to your regression tests without writing code.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede1.title: LogSpot
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede1.content: Full unified web and product analytics platform, including embeddable analytics widgets and automated robots (slack, telegram, and webhooks). Free plan includes 10,000 events per month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede2.title: Umami
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede2.content: Simple, fast, privacy-focused, open-source alternative to Google Analytics.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede3.title: TrackWith Dicloud
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede3.content: Free lightweight privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. Unlimited pageviews, unlimited visitor, unlimited page heatmaps & goal tracking. Free for up to 3 domains and 600 session replay per domain.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede4.title: AppFit
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede4.content: AppFit is a comprehensive analytics and product management tool designed to facilitate seamless, cross-platform management of analytics and product updates. Free plan includes 10,000 events per month, product journal and weekly insights.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede5.title: Seline
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede5.content: Seline is a simple & private website and product analytics. Cookieless, lightweight, independent. Free plan includes 3,000 events per month and provides access to all our features, such as the dashboard, user journeys, funnels, and more.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede6.title: Reactflow.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede6.content: Per site: 1,000 pages views/day, three heatmaps, three widgets, free bug tracking

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede7.title: OpenReplay.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede7.content: Open-source session replay with dev tools for bug reproduction, live session for real-time support, and product analytics suite. One thousand sessions/month with access to all features and 7-day retention.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede8.title: LogRocket.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede8.content: 1,000 sessions/month with 30-day retention, error tracking, live mode

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede9.title: FullStory.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbede9.content: 1,000 sessions/month with one month data retention and three user seats. More information [here](https://help.fullstory.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020623354-FullStory-Free-Edition).

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedea.title: hotjar.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedea.content: Per site: 1,050 pages views/month, unlimited heatmaps, data stored for three months

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedec.title: Microsoft Clarity
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedec.content: Session recording completely free with "no traffic limits", no project limits, and no sampling

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedef.title: smartlook.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedef.content: free packages for web and mobile apps (1500 sessions/month), three heatmaps, one funnel, 1-month data history

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf0.title: howuku.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf0.content: Track user interaction, engagement, and event. Free for up to 5,000 visits/month

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf1.title: UXtweak.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf1.content: Record and watch how visitors use your website or app. Free unlimited time for small projects

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf2.title: numverify
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf2.content: Global phone number validation and lookup JSON API. 100 API requests/month
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf2.category: International Mobile Number Verification API and SDK

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf3.title: veriphone
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf3.content: Global phone number verification in a free, fast, reliable JSON API. 1000 requests/month
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf3.category: International Mobile Number Verification API and SDK

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf4.title: Qonversion
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf4.content: All-in-one cross-platform subscription management platform offering analytics, A/B testing, Apple Search Ads, remote configs, and growth tools for optimizing in-app purchases and monetization. Compatible with iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, Cordova, Stripe, and web. Free up to $10k in monthly tracked revenue.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf8.title: CoinMarketCap
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf8.content: Provides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto and fiat currency exchange rates. The free tier offers 10K call credits/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf9.title: CurrencyFreaks
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedf9.content: Provides current and historical currency exchange rates. Free DEVELOPER plan available with 1000 requests/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfa.title: CoinGecko
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfa.content: Provides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto exchange rates and historical data. The demo api comes with a stable rate limit of 30 calls/min and a monthly cap of 10,000 calls.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfb.title: CurrencyApi
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfb.content: Live Currency Rates for Physical and Cryptocurrencies, delivered in JSON and XML. The free tier offers 1,250 API requests/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfc.title: currencylayer
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfc.content: Reliable Exchange Rates and Currency Conversion for your Business, 100 API requests/month free.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfd.title: exchangerate-api.com
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfd.content: An easy-to-use currency conversion JSON API. The free tier updates once per day with a limit of 1,500 requests/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfe.title: FraudLabsPRO
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedfe.content: Help merchants to prevent payment fraud and chargebacks. Free Micro Plan available with 500 queries/month.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedff.title: FxRatesAPI
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbedff.content: Provides real-time and historical exchange rates. The free tier requires attribution.

67e3c8a4c443774ecacbee00.title: Moesif API Monetization
67e3c8a4c443774ecacbee00.content: Generate revenue from APIs via usage-based billing. Connect to Stripe, Chargebee, etc. The free tier offers 30,000 events/month.
